[é³¥]
Pictogram ( è±¡å½¢ ): a bird with a dangling tail.
Compare çƒ , which is very similar, of similar origin, and éš¹ , which originated from a similar image of a bird, but is today rather more abstract and less recognizable. Compare to Egyptian ğ“„¿
